tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conversations (
    conversation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transcript_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transcript_id) REFERENCES chat_transcripts(transcript_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms(room_id)
);
CREATE TABLE chat_transcripts (id INT, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE conversations (conversation_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE chat_logs (log_id INT, transcript_id INT, message TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE transcripts_meta (transcript_id INT, user_id INT, status VARCHAR(50))
